bug.author: seveibar
bug.description: When you enter a collaborative session, the URL should change to link to the session id (just add ?s=SESSION_ID to the url.

comments.comment:
🎉 This issue has been resolved in version 0.14.5 🎉 The release is available on:
GitHub release npm package (@latest dist-tag)
